original_text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory; why yet am I also judged as a sinner?
korean_text: 그러나 나의 거짓말로 하나님의 참되심이 더 풍성하여 그의 영광이 되었다면 어찌 내가 죄인처럼 심판을 받으리요

sentences.original_text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded
through my lie unto his glory
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 거짓을 통해 그의 영광을 위해

sentences.original_text: why yet am I also judged as a sinner?
